ygData.subject: Re: Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe it is a life tap, takes health from what you are attacking and gives it to you.  not sure how many hp it takes. Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard,
ygData.messageBody:
i believe it is a life tap, takes health from what you are attacking and
gives it to you. not sure how many hp it takes.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
> Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 8:50 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
>
>
> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
> Hello all. This isn't bard related, but I was wondering if any of you
> know what the "blood claw" effect of the Stilleto is? We grabbed one
> last night. Thanks.
>
> Jyzan
